body: @donkeybringer Yeah. They definitely just called the plot bad before even reading it. I don't understand why they even feel the need to provide their take on a work that they didn't even understand. Tastes aside, that just doesn't make sense. Anyway, I think this "MC discovering the secret relationship of his crush" kinda falls into NTR, or at the very least I've seen works that gets the tag for it. But yes, this definitely has no shreds of cheating.

lol no one understand Japanese and all pretended to know the plot. The girl was once dating with her coach, until they broke up and now she date MC. MC used hypnosis to let her tell her past. Just memory. No cheating or netorare yet, but this is setting up towards true netorare in future chapters as the girl reunite with her ex-coach.
This is a low lvl ntr ... not bad in art style but the story is moronic on many levels. There is a stretch for ntr stories but this one wins hard on how dumb the whole thing is. 6/10
0 logic, this is a completely trash.

Why did she even cheat in the first place? And why didnt she stop? Usually theres a scene where the cheater and the original guy hookup, and it's not good enough, before the girl goes back to the ntr guy.
so she cheated on him, confessed about cheatin and continued to cheat is what ur sayin? damn, she belong to the streets..
What I understand, FMC confess that she had sex with coach her childhood friend or boy friend accept it but in the end FMC still with coach.
